author: Engineezy
description:
Is this the most over engineered way to cool an @OLIPOP ?
•••
 Inspired by @outsidebrendan I wanted to see if I could make a drink-cooling contraption Engineezy style using a drill powered pump, some gears, and a cooler filled with below freezing water. Using a thermal camera I was able to measure the temperature of the drink after a couple minutes in the machine and I was shocked by the results!
•••
#olipop #ad #engineering #mechanicalengineering #overengineered
title: High Speed Drink-Cooling Machine
